name: BostonGlobe
text: “My most fervent wish is that I will not be replaced until a new president is installed," Ruth Bader Ginsburg reportedly told her granddaughter before her death, NPR reported Friday. https://t.co/YR9oZv5DxD

name: BostonGlobe
text: Mitch McConnell pledges to hold a vote on Supreme Court vacancy following death of Ruth Bader Ginsburg. "President Trump’s nominee will receive a vote on the floor of the United States Senate," he said. https://t.co/VCwhMvMheR

name: BostonGlobe
text: Hillary Clinton, Elizabeth Warren, and more react to Ruth Bader Ginsburg's death. https://t.co/EdyHge6cKJ #RBG
